name: Simple Click Tracker Lite
author: NAMS, Inc

sections.description:
Simple Click Tracker is a self-hosted technology that tracks the most essential and basic elements of your marketing campaigns.

Features:
* Shorten and clean up long affiliate links
* Create permanent links for sharing or publication, whose destination can be changed
* Create easy to remember links to profiles and reference pages

Feedback

  • Thank you for using the the Simple Click Tracker Lite
  • At NAMS Toolkit we are always open to your suggestions and feedback, it’s how we get better for you.
  • Contact us here on our site:NAMS Toolkit

More

  • Also see our other plugins

Additional Info

Our Philosophy: Tools that Simply Work
sections.faq:
Does the plugin has some custom requirements?
You only need to have PHP 5.6+
sections.changelog:
1.3.0

  • Stable release for WordPress 6.3

1.0.0

  • First stable released version
  • Stable release for WordPress 5.9
